column4: So, in 8.10, there's no sun-java6-plugin package? i can't seem to get java workign in firefox
E: Package sun-java6-plugin has no installation candidate
sun-java6-plugin is in intrepid... could be your mirror doesn't want to ship it due to licensing issues or something though?
also, make sure you don't have openjdk around, it'll conflict (see in 'about:plugins' in firefox to see what it sees)
